text:
Ibrahim Cevahir (born on 1938, Trabzon - died, September 21, 2015, Istanbul) is a Turkish entrepreneur and businessman. he also is the founder and former Chairman of Cevahir Holding. In 1959, Cevahir Holding's foundations entered the construction sector with his brothers.
He died of a heart attack on September 21, 2015 in Istanbul at the age of 77.
